mapper.select: SELECT kb.ib_seq , C.c_type, kb.ib_title, kb.smb_id, kb.ib_content , kb.ib_create FROM shop.ask_b AS kb, shop.combox AS C WHERE kb.num = C.num ORDER BY kb.ib_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop.ask_b (ib_seq, num, ib_title, smb_id, ib_content, ib_create) VALUES (#{ibSeq}, #{cType}, #{ibTitle}, 'admin', #{ibContent}, NOW())
